title: Steelers get by Natives
text:

Ty Kraus had a pair of goals as the visiting Selkirk Steelers beat the Neepawa Natives 4-1 at the Yellowhead Centre on Wednesday. 
In the first meeting of the season between the two Manitoba Junior Hockey League teams, Jared Pelechaty of the Natives tied the game 1-1 late in the second period but Kraus scored his second mid
